column4: Morning everyone. Im in the live cd boot of ubuntu trying to backup my data before i try to fix my broken grub. When i enter sudo fsck /win/ubuntu/disks/root.disk in my terminal i get ^The super block could not be read....^
Any ideas of what i could do about that?
Im trying to backup a wubi install btw..
the new parteg, gparted etc can't use the ntfs properly(you cant modify it)
